content.p: The Haydn Green Institute provides a programme of world class entrepreneurial education teaching over 4,000 students per annum across all our programmes with the aim of developing the innovators and entrepreneurs of the future. As well as undergraduate and postgraduate study options, the Institute can also provide your organisation with a wide range of effective executive development and learning solutions, including entrepreneurship in practice. Vader Johnson MSc Entrepreneurship, Innovation and Management Jubilee Campus Nottingham NG8 1BB Email: ingenuitylab@nottingham.ac.uk
